means: 粗饲料，粗粮，粗糙的原料

word_mean: 粗糙食物：饮食中不能消化的物质，例如纤维、纤维素等
干物质中粗纤维含量在18%以上的饲料。

sentence.Network_en: I'll give you some advice about life. Eat more roughage.
sentence.Network_cn: 给你生活的忠告, 多吃些粗粮.

sentence.Network_en: This product can increase the rate of roughage, lower investment cost.
sentence.Network_cn: 增加刍料利用率, 降低饲养成本.

sentence.Network_en: If you're constipated you should eat more roughage.
sentence.Network_cn: 假若便秘就应该多吃粗糙食物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... roofage 盖屋顶的材料 roughage 粗粮，粗饲料 package 包裹.
摘要: 根据前述国际饲料分类原则，粗饲料(roughage)是指自然状态下水分在45%以下、饲料干物质中粗纤维含量≥18 %，能量价值低的一类饲料，主要包括干草.
雅思口语常用词汇 - 雅思口语 ... sandwich 三明治 roughage 纤维食品 pudding 布丁.
rotifer 轮虫roughage 粗糙食物 ; 基糠round window 圆窗 ; 正圆窗

use of biotechnology in the development of roughage resources ., 生物技术在粗饲料资源开发上的应用.

entry.def: Roughage consists of the tough parts of vegetables and grains that help you to digest your food and help your bowels to work properly.

means.word_mean: 1. coarse food high in fiber but low in nutrients; its bulk stimulates peristalsis
